title: Nice n28 Caruthers PSA 4 available....price lowered!

posts.post_title: Nice n28 Caruthers PSA 4 available....price lowered!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen
Terrific looking card.  No creases, edgewear or significant staining.  The corners are mostly sharp as well with only slight touches.  There is a qualifier on the card due to a pinkish looking printer's line on the back of the card towards the top.  The back also exhibits some very mild toning.  Overall, still a very attractive piece though.  Asking $285 delivered.  

Thanks in advance,
Brian
